thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Bruker Reports Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.02

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Bruker Reports Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.02
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Bruker Corp:
* BRUKER REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.51 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 12.8 PERCENT TO $530.5 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.34 TO $1.38 * Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.02 * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE UP ABOUT 7 PERCENT * DUE TO EFFECTS OF U.S. TAX REFORM RECORDED A CHARGE OF $68.9 MILLION IN QUARTER Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
